item.title: Sam add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "One day Alice came to a fork in the road and saw a Cheshire cat in a tree. ‘Which road do I take?’ she asked. ‘Where do you want to go?’ was his response. ‘I don’t know,’ Alice answered. ‘Then,’ said the cat, ‘it doesn’t matter." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Sam add a quote by Jake Ducey
item.description: "Most of us are busy gambling on the most dangerous risk of all—living our whole life not doing what we want on the bet that we can buy the freedom to do it later." -- Jake Ducey

item.title: Sam add a quote by Jake Ducey
item.description: "One of your inalienable rights as a human being should be to receive a mysteriously useful omen every day of your life. —Rob Brezsny" -- Jake Ducey

item.title: Sam add a quote by John Green
item.description: "the more I realize that humans lack good mirrors. It’s so hard for anyone to show us how we look, and so hard for us to show anyone how we feel." -- John Green

item.title: Sam add a quote by Caitlin Moran
item.description: "The real cost of living is dying, and we’re spending days like millionaires: a week here, a month there, casually spunked until all you have left are the two pennies on your eyes." -- Caitlin Moran

item.title: Sam add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "Death is so terribly final, while life is full of possibilities." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Sam add a quote by Norton Juster
item.description: "So many things are possible just as long as you don't know they're impossible." -- Norton Juster
